title: A Tribute to Mariane
description: This website is dedicated to the love and admiration for Mariane, showcasing beautiful memories, romantic letters, and interactive experiences.

hero.headline: To My Dearest Mariane
hero.subheadline: A journey of love and memories

loveLetter.body: Every moment spent with you is like a beautiful dream come true. Your smile lights up my darkest days, and your laughter is the sweetest melody I know. I cherish every memory we create together.

quotes.text: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are my sun, my moon, and all my stars.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

gallery.caption: Our first date at the park.
The day we watched the sunset together.
A beautiful moment captured during our trip.
